channel.title: Connection to, 127.0.0.1 No Else Can Connect But Me
channel.description:
[size=24pt]OK NOW, WHEN PEOPLE LOG IN LIKE MY SELF AND MY FRIEND MY FRIENDS CANT LOG IN BECUASE ON THE SOURCE RUNNER IT SHOWS 127.0.0.1 WHEN YOU CONNECT WHEN ITS SUPPOSED TO BE LIKE BIGPOND.NET.121.210.12.2.QLD SO FORTH NOW ITS A BLURR CLIENT HOW WOULD YOU CHANGE THAT? PLEASE PUT CODE IF YOU DONT UNDERSTAND HERE.
[IMG]http://i489.photobucket.com/albums/rr257/riskypker/lol.jpg[/img] Thats At the start of GUI.java
[IMG]http://i489.photobucket.com/albums/rr257/riskypker/change.jpg[/img] This is at the end of GUI.Java
[IMG]http://i489.photobucket.com/albums/rr257/riskypker/hj.jpg[/img]
And i just need help what are they supposed to be?> THANKS SKIPA![/size]

item.title: Connection to, 127.0.0.1 No Else Can Connect But Me
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

The person who is hostin server has to connect on 127.0.0.1, all other players must connect with the ip of server

So for instance, i am hosting my server. i have to use ip 127.0.0.1 its default ip.

They have to use chosenpkz.no-ip.biz…

Read full topic

item.title: Connection to, 127.0.0.1 No Else Can Connect But Me
item.dc:creator: @Chaostheory Chaostheory
item.description:
@Chaostheory wrote:

127.0.0.1 is your default IP address.

You use it to connect to your own server.

Read full topic
